name: Planet Smashers (GuyInGrey)
description:
Welcome to Planet Smashers!

You'll start out with some miners and fighters around your station. Your objective is to destroy all enemies! (No victory or loss screen currently, just pretend you won)

This game is turn based. Every turn your miners are over planets or asteroids, you'll get resources. You can use those to build ships around your station.

Currently, the Carrier has no functionality, so don't make it.

Controls: Scroll wheel zooms, WASD to move camera.

Music Credits: Sad Past - Silent Partner (No Copyright) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ESt6TpBAjcE
